title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, the file does not get closed even though no changes have been made.
OB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, the file remains open even though no changes have been made.
EB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, the file should be closed as no changes have been made.
SR:
Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, perform the following steps: 
1. Close all existing editor tabs. 
2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
